title: Cellular Modem RF Software Engineering Program Manager
summary: Imagine what you could do here! At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish...
description: -  Own the development of Cellular RF Software controlling the RF transceivers and Front-end components in real-time full signaling mode....
key_qualifications: Demonstrated ability with a track record of hands-on program management, project management or engineering management in the FW/SW domain....
education_experience: BS and 10+ years relevant industry experience.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range...
